name: Indicate Media
overview:
With headquarters in New York City, Indicate Media is a strategic public relations firm dedicated to advancing the communication strategies of our clients. We offer a wide range of integrated services and develop customized solutions tailored to meet the specific needs and goals of each company we represent.

Indicate Media specialty areas include: technology, education, energy, financial services and entertainment.
